meanings.sent1: The temblors of the train made it hard to read.
meanings.sent2: The temblors in the ground were a sign of an approaching earthquake.
meanings.sent3: The temblors in my hands made it difficult to hold the glass steady.
meanings.sent4: The temblors of excitement ran through the crowd as the concert began.
meanings.sent5: The temblors of fear gripped her heart as she waited for the test results.

meanings.sent1: The temblors caused buildings to sway dangerously.
meanings.sent2: People rushed out of their homes during the temblors.
meanings.sent3: The temblors interrupted the peaceful afternoon with a jolt.
meanings.sent4: The temblors shook the city awake in the middle of the night.
meanings.sent5: The temblors left a trail of destruction in their wake.
